title: Couple With Heart Person Man Light Skin Tone Medium Dark Skin Tone
alsoKnownAs: Couple With Heart Man Diverse Skin Tones
description: Depicts a couple where one person is a man with a light skin tone and the other is a man with a medium-dark skin tone, with a heart signifying their love and connection. Used to represent same-sex relationships, love, and partnership with diverse skin tones.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji beautifully illustrates a couple, with a man of light skin tone and a person of medium-dark skin tone, surrounded by a glowing heart. Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and smooth gradients enhance the romantic ambiance, making the heart appear radiant and full of love. The gentle embrace and shared focus on the heart symbolize a strong, loving partnership and deep affection, a perfect visual for expressing profound connection on Apple devices.
